title: It Ain't Easy Being A Guitar Player: Annoying Things Guitarists Have To Deal With Every Day [News]
text: curiousjoe 20 · 3 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply Whoever tunes a guitar lying down flat like that is a fucking idiot. Yes, that includes "professionals". You should always tune and adjust intonation in playing position. That's the only way to truly tune or adjust intonation. Setting it in a cradle actually slightly bends the neck. So if you tune/intonate lying it down, putting it playing position will make it slightly out. Also there's no way to get hit in the face tuning in playing position. 4 The guy puts his videos' titles in all caps, so one can't expect him to be smart enough to know that. 3
